title: AN ACT relating to a provisional license to practice medicine.
subject: Administrative Regulations and Proceedings
Boards and Commissions
Health and Medical Services
Hospitals and Nursing Homes
Licensing
Physicians and Practitioners
Reports Mandated

abstracts.abstract: Create a new section of KRS Chapter 311.530 to 311.620 to permit an international medical graduate to apply for a provisional license that may lead to a full and unrestricted license to practice medicine in Kentucky notwithstanding KRS 311.571; require the Board of Medical Licensure to promulgate administrative regulations to establish provisional licensure pathway requirements, applicant requirements, eligibility for obtaining a full and unrestricted license after completing the provisional period, establish a data collection process to evaluate the provisional license option, and require an annual report to the Legislative Research Commission.
